strings.intro: openHAB - "empowering the smart home" - automatizare de locuințe open source, independent de producatori și tehnologii
strings.lighting: Iluminat: Philips Hue, Ikea Trådfri, LIFX, Lutron, Milight, ...
strings.home_entertainment: • Sisteme de divertisment: Samsung TV, LG TV, Sonos, Pioneer AVR, Squeezebox, Kodi, Plex, ...
strings.open_protocols: • Protocoale deschise: HTTP, TCP/UDP, MQTT, Serial, ...
strings.special_useCases: • Cazuri speciale de utilizare: Minecraft, Tesla Car, Weather Services, ...
